# manCULTA

Ivan Jacob Agaloos Pesigan 2025-12-29

## Description

Research compendium for the manuscript Pesigan, I. J. A., Russell, M.
A., Chow, S.-M. (2025). Common and Unique Latent Transition Analysis
(CULTA) as a Way to Examine the Trait-State Dynamics of Alcohol
Intoxication. *Psychology of Addictive Behaviors*, *39*(8), 743-762.
<https://doi.org/10.1037/adb0001106>.

## Acknowledgments

This research was made possible by the Prevention and Methodology
Training Program (PAMT) funded by a T32 training grant (T32 DA017629,
MPIs: J. Maggs & S. Lanza) from the National Institute on Drug Abuse
(NIDA); the National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences grant
UL1TR002014-06; and pilot mentoring and professional development awards
through P50DA039838 awarded to Michael A. Russell (National Institute on
Drug Abuse, PI: L. Collins), as well as support from the Social Science
Research Institute at Penn State and departmental funds awarded to
Michael A. Russell.

Computations for this research were performed on the Pennsylvania State
University’s Institute for Computational and Data Sciences’ Roar
supercomputer using SLURM for job scheduling (Yoo et al., 2003), GNU
Parallel to run the simulations in parallel (Tange, 2021), and Apptainer
to ensure a reproducible software stack (Kurtzer et al., 2017, 2021).
See `.sim/README.md` and the scripts in the `.sim` folder in the
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA) repository for more
details on how the simulations were performed.

## Installation

You can install `manCULTA` from
[GitHub](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA) with:

``` r

if (!require("remotes")) install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jeksterslab/manCULTA")
```

See
[Containers](https://jeksterslab.github.io/manCULTA/articles/containers.html)
for containerized versions of the package.

## Author-Accepted Manuscript

See
<https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/blob/main/.setup/latex/manCULTA-manuscript.Rtex>
for the latex file of the manuscript. See
<https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/blob/latex/manCULTA-manuscript.pdf>
for the compiled PDF.

## More Information

See [GitHub Pages](https://jeksterslab.github.io/manCULTA/index.html)
for package documentation.

# Package index

## Data Generation Functions

- [`GenCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/GenCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulate Observed Data from a Two-Profile CULTA Model
- [`GenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/GenData.md)
  : Simulate Data

## Model Fitting Functions

- [`FitCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Fit the One-Profile CULTA Model (CUTS Model with AR)
- [`FitCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Fit the Two-Profile CULTA Model
- [`FitLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Fit the Two-Profile LTA Model
- [`FitRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Fit the Two-Profile RILTA Model
- [`InputCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Generate Mplus Inout file for the One-Profile CULTA Model (CUTS
  Model with AR)
- [`InputCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Generate Mplus Input file for the Two-Profile CULTA Model
- [`InputLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Generate Mplus Input file for the Two-Profile LTA Model
- [`InputRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Generate Mplus Input file for the Two-Profile RILTA Model

## Simulation Functions

- [`Sim()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/Sim.md) :
  Simulation Replication
- [`SimFN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFN.md)
  : Simulation File Name
- [`SimFitCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitCULTA1Profile
- [`SimFitCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitCULTA2Profiles
- [`SimFitLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitLTA2Profiles
- [`SimFitRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitRILTA2Profiles
- [`SimGenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimGenData.md)
  : Simulation Replication - GenData
- [`SimProj()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimProj.md)
  : Simulation Project Name
- [`Sum()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/Sum.md) :
  Summary
- [`SumFitCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Summary (FitCULTA1Profile)
- [`SumFitCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitCULTA2Profiles)
- [`SumFitLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitLTA2Profiles)
- [`SumFitRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitRILTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsCULTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsLTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsRILTA2Profiles)
- [`SumParamsCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumParamsCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (ParamsCULTA2Profiles)

## Summary Functions

- [`Sum()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/Sum.md) :
  Summary
- [`SumFitCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Summary (FitCULTA1Profile)
- [`SumFitCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitCULTA2Profiles)
- [`SumFitLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitLTA2Profiles)
- [`SumFitRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitRILTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsCULTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsLTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsRILTA2Profiles)
- [`SumParamsCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumParamsCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (ParamsCULTA2Profiles)

## Data

- [`params`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/params.md)
  : Simulation Parameters
- [`results_culta_est`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/results_culta_est.md)
  : Simulation Results (CULTA Estimates)
- [`results_entropy`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/results_entropy.md)
  : Simulation Results (Entropy)
- [`results_ic`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/results_ic.md)
  : Simulation Results (Information Criteria)
- [`results_lta_est`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/results_lta_est.md)
  : Simulation Results (LTA Estimates)

## Figures

- [`FigBiasCULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigBiasCULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Relative Bias (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigBiasLTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigBiasLTAEst.md)
  : Plot Relative Bias (LTA Estimates)
- [`FigCoverageCULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigCoverageCULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Coverage Probabilities (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigCoverageLTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigCoverageLTAEst.md)
  : Plot Coverage Probabilities (LTA Estimates)
- [`FigEntropy()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigEntropy.md)
  : Plot Entropy
- [`FigIC()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigIC.md)
  : Plot Information Criteria
- [`FigPowerCULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigPowerCULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Statistical Power (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigPowerLTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigPowerLTAEst.md)
  : Plot Statistical Power (LTA Estimates)
- [`FigRMSECULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigRMSECULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Root Mean Square Error (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigRMSELTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigRMSELTAEst.md)
  : Plot Root Mean Square Error (LTA Estimates)

## Methods

- [`AIC(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/AIC.fitculta.md)
  : Akaike's Information Criterion

- [`BIC(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/BIC.fitculta.md)
  : Bayesian Information Criterion

- [`WriteData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/WriteData.md)
  : Write Data to File

- [`anova(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/anova.fitculta.md)
  :

  Compare Two Nested `fitculta` Models Using Scaled Chi-Square
  Difference Test

- [`as.data.frame(`*`<simculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/as.data.frame.simculta.md)
  :

  Coerce an Object of Class `simculta` to a Data Frame

- [`as.matrix(`*`<simculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/as.matrix.simculta.md)
  :

  Coerce an Object of Class `simculta` to a Matrix

- [`coef(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/coef.fitculta.md)
  : Parameter Estimates

- [`confint(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/confint.fitculta.md)
  : Confidence Intervals for Parameter Estimates

- [`converged()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/converged.md)
  : Convergence Status of a Model Fit

- [`entropy()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/entropy.md)
  : Entropy

- [`logLik(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/logLik.fitculta.md)
  : Extract Log-Likelihood

- [`print(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/print.fitculta.md)
  :

  Print Method for an Object of Class `fitculta`

- [`print(`*`<simculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/print.simculta.md)
  :

  Print Method for an Object of Class `simculta`

- [`summary(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/summary.fitculta.md)
  :

  Summary Method for an Object of Class `fitculta`

- [`vcov(`*`<fitculta>`*`)`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/vcov.fitculta.md)
  : Sampling Covariance Matrix

## All Functions

- [`Compress()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/Compress.md)
  : Compress Replication
- [`FigBiasCULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigBiasCULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Relative Bias (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigBiasLTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigBiasLTAEst.md)
  : Plot Relative Bias (LTA Estimates)
- [`FigCoverageCULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigCoverageCULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Coverage Probabilities (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigCoverageLTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigCoverageLTAEst.md)
  : Plot Coverage Probabilities (LTA Estimates)
- [`FigEntropy()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigEntropy.md)
  : Plot Entropy
- [`FigIC()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigIC.md)
  : Plot Information Criteria
- [`FigPowerCULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigPowerCULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Statistical Power (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigPowerLTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigPowerLTAEst.md)
  : Plot Statistical Power (LTA Estimates)
- [`FigRMSECULTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigRMSECULTAEst.md)
  : Plot Root Mean Square Error (CULTA Estimates)
- [`FigRMSELTAEst()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FigRMSELTAEst.md)
  : Plot Root Mean Square Error (LTA Estimates)
- [`FitCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Fit the One-Profile CULTA Model (CUTS Model with AR)
- [`FitCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Fit the Two-Profile CULTA Model
- [`FitLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Fit the Two-Profile LTA Model
- [`FitRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/FitRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Fit the Two-Profile RILTA Model
- [`GenCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/GenCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulate Observed Data from a Two-Profile CULTA Model
- [`GenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/GenData.md)
  : Simulate Data
- [`InputCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Generate Mplus Inout file for the One-Profile CULTA Model (CUTS
  Model with AR)
- [`InputCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Generate Mplus Input file for the Two-Profile CULTA Model
- [`InputLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Generate Mplus Input file for the Two-Profile LTA Model
- [`InputRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/InputRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Generate Mplus Input file for the Two-Profile RILTA Model
- [`Sim()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/Sim.md) :
  Simulation Replication
- [`SimFN()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFN.md)
  : Simulation File Name
- [`SimFitCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitCULTA1Profile
- [`SimFitCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitCULTA2Profiles
- [`SimFitLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitLTA2Profiles
- [`SimFitRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimFitRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Simulation Replication - FitRILTA2Profiles
- [`SimGenData()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimGenData.md)
  : Simulation Replication - GenData
- [`SimProj()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SimProj.md)
  : Simulation Project Name
- [`Sum()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/Sum.md) :
  Summary
- [`SumFitCULTA1Profile()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitCULTA1Profile.md)
  : Summary (FitCULTA1Profile)
- [`SumFitCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitCULTA2Profiles)
- [`SumFitLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitLTA2Profiles)
- [`SumFitRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumFitRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (FitRILTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsCULTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsLTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsLTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsLTA2Profiles)
- [`SumLTAParamsRILTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumLTAParamsRILTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (LTAParamsRILTA2Profiles)
- [`SumParamsCULTA2Profiles()`](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/reference/SumParamsCULTA2Profiles.md)
  : Summary (ParamsCULTA2Profiles)

### manCULTA

- [manCULTA](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/manCULTA.md):

### Mplus Input File for the Empirical Data Analysis

- [Mplus Input File for the Empirical Data
  Analysis](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/empirical-mplus.md):

### Data Simulation and Model Fitting

- [Two-Profile Common and Unique Latent Transition
  Analysis](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/sim-culta-2-profiles.md):

### Comparison of Misspecified and Correctly Specified Models

- [Comparing One- and Two-Profile
  Models](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/sim-culta-1-profile.md):
- [Comparing Two-Profile LTA and CULTA
  Models](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/sim-lta-2-profiles.md):
- [Comparing Two-Profile RILTA and CULTA
  Models](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/sim-rilta-2-profiles.md):
- [With Starting
  Values](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/sim-all-starts.md):

- [Generating Mplus Input
  Files](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/sim-input.md):

- [Simulation
  Parameters](https://github.com/jeksterslab/manCULTA/articles/params.md):
